entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rockglen 11:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: S 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
